headline: AIG Appoints John Neal as President
summary: NEW YORK, July 16, 2025--American International Group, Inc. (NYSE: AIG) today announced that John Neal will be joining AIG as President, effective December 1, 2025. In this role, Mr. Neal will report to Chairman & CEO, Peter Zaffino and lead AIG’s General Insurance organization, which includes the North America Commercial Insurance, International Commercial Insurance and Global Personal Insurance businesses. He will become a member of AIG’s Executive Leadership team.
